chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
The defendant Mykle J. McMahon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Mykle J. McMahon is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Mykle J. McMahon was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: PAY DIRECT TO CLERK OF COURT, ANY BOND APPLIES
No contact with any victim. No unserpervised contact with minor females.
Defendant must submit to STD testing which is to be shared with victims. Defendant must register with Sex Offender Registry. Can not vote for 15 years.
Defendant must complete AODA and follow recomondantions and must under go all evals and assesments required by probation officer to include sex eval.
